languages.text: Магос Ханейманн лишился своего сопровождения и просит Лорд-капитана сопроводить его к губернатору. Заключение союзнических договоренностей с членом Адептус Механикус достаточно высокого ранга в будущем может упростить поиск технопровидца на корабль.

Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.
languages.original_text: Магос Ханейманн лишился своего сопровождения и просит Лорд-капитана сопроводить его к губернатору. Заключение союзнических договоренностей с членом Адептус Механикус достаточно высокого ранга в будущем может упростить поиск технопровидца на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member might expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

languages.text: Le magos Haneumann a perdu son escorte et a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de le conduire auprès du gouverneur. Une alliance avec un membre haut gradé de l'Adeptus Mechanicus pourrait accélérer la recherche d'un nouveau technaugure pour le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Le magos Haneumann a perdu son escorte et a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de le conduire auprès du gouverneur. Une alliance avec un membre haut gradé de l'Adeptus Mechanicus pourrait accélérer la recherche d'un nouveau technaugure pour le vaisseau.

languages.text: 哈努曼贤者失去了护卫队，因此请求行商浪人护送他去见总督。如果能和机械修会的高阶成员建立联盟关系，说不定很快就能为虚空舰找到新的引擎先知。
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

traits.locale_text: 哈努曼贤者失去了护卫队，因此请求行商浪人护送他去见总督。如果能和机械修会的高阶成员建立联盟关系，说不定很快就能为虚空舰找到新的引擎先知。

languages.text: マゴス・ヘニュマンは護衛を失ったため、総督の元へ向かう際の護衛をロード・キャプテンに依頼してきた。帝国技術局の高官と同盟を結べば、ヴォイドシップの機関整備師を新たに探す際に有利になるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

traits.locale_text: マゴス・ヘニュマンは護衛を失ったため、総督の元へ向かう際の護衛をロード・キャプテンに依頼してきた。帝国技術局の高官と同盟を結べば、ヴォイドシップの機関整備師を新たに探す際に有利になるかもしれない。

languages.text: Magos Haneumann hat seine Eskorte verloren und den Lord Captain gebeten, ihn zum Gouverneur zu geleiten. Durch ein Bündnis mit einem hochrangigen Mitglied des Adeptus Mechanicus lässt sich die Suche nach einem neuen Maschinenseher für das Raumschiff vielleicht beschleunigen.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Magos Haneumann hat seine Eskorte verloren und den Lord Captain gebeten, ihn zum Gouverneur zu geleiten. Durch ein Bündnis mit einem hochrangigen Mitglied des Adeptus Mechanicus lässt sich die Suche nach einem neuen Maschinenseher für das Raumschiff vielleicht beschleunigen.

languages.text: El Magos Haneumann ha perdido su escolta y pide a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que lo escolte hasta el gobernador. Aliarse con un miembro de alto rango del Adeptus Mechanicus podría agilizar la búsqueda de un nuevo visioingeniero para la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.

traits.locale_text: El Magos Haneumann ha perdido su escolta y pide a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que lo escolte hasta el gobernador. Aliarse con un miembro de alto rango del Adeptus Mechanicus podría agilizar la búsqueda de un nuevo visioingeniero para la nave del vacío.

languages.text: Eşlikçisini kaybeden Magos Haneumann, Lord Kaptan'dan ona valiye kadar eşlik etmesini istedi. Yüksek rütbeli bir Adeptus Mechanicus mensubuyla ittifak kurmak, uçsuz gemisine yeni Mühedyum bulma arayışını hızlandırabilir.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann has lost his escort and asked the Lord Captain to escort him to the governor. Establishing an alliance with a high-ranking Adeptus Mechanicus member may expedite the search for the new Enginseer for the voidship.
